jobs.modal.title.description: Jobs apply modal title, {0} will be replaced with the job name.

jobs.modal.step.description: Step indicator of the modal. {0} will be replaced with the current page .

jobs.modal.buttons.join.description: Join Discord button in the modal.

jobs.modal.error.description: Error when user did not fill all the fields.

jobs.modal.notice.message: PreMiD is an open-source project, meaning we are a non-profit team, every donation or patreon money goes back into the product. By applying for a job position at PreMiD you acknowledge that you are volunteering in the team, you will not be payed for your work.

jobs.guild.required.description: Title of the modal the user will see if it's not in Discord server.

jobs.guild.explanation.message: To be able to apply you must have joined our Discord server. Otherwise we won't be able to contant you if you end up beaing selected!
jobs.guild.explanation.description: Explanation why users should be in Discord server to perform job application.

jobs.header.title.description: First part of the jobs page.

jobs.header.description.message: Are you ready to help out the biggest Rich-Presence library?
jobs.header.description.description: The second part of the jobs page.

jobs.openings.title.description: Text before the available job positions cards.

jobs.benefit1.description.message: Get in touch with the people behind PreMiD.

jobs.benefit2.description.message: Have a look into our Development and Marketing.

jobs.benefit3.description.message: Powerful Discord permissions and a colorful role.

jobs.benefit4.description.message: With your contribution it is possible to run this project.

jobs.benefit5.description.message: Take your time. This is voluntary work.

jobs.benefit6.description.message: Be able to test new features before anyone else.
